7 # Command Status
8 # from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus

10 class RobotStatusRosWrapperException(Exception):
11  pass
12 
13 
14 class RobotStatusRosWrapper(object):
15  def __init__(self, service_timeout=1):
16  self.__service_timeout = service_timeout
17 
18  def shutdown(self):
19  res = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_rpi/shutdown_rpi', AdvertiseShutdown,
20  AdvertiseShutdownRequest.SHUTDOWN)
21  return self.__classic_return_w_check(res)
22 
23  def reboot(self):
24  res = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_rpi/shutdown_rpi', AdvertiseShutdown,
25  AdvertiseShutdownRequest.REBOOT)
26  return self.__classic_return_w_check(res)
27 
28  def prepare_update(self):
29  try:
30  res = self.__call_service('/niryo_robot_status/advertise_shutdown', AdvertiseShutdown,
31  AdvertiseShutdownRequest.UPDATE)
32 
33  except RobotStatusRosWrapperException:
34  return False
35 
36  return res.status < 0
37 
38  # --- Functions interface
39  def __call_service(self, service_name, service_msg_type, *args):
40  """
41  Wait for the service called service_name
42  Then call the service with args
43 
44  :param service_name:
45  :param service_msg_type:
46  :param args: Tuple of arguments
47  :raises NiryoRosWrapperException: Timeout during waiting of services
48  :return: Response
49  """
50  # Connect to service
51  try:
52  rospy.wait_for_service(service_name, self.__service_timeout)
53  except rospy.ROSException as e:
54  raise RobotStatusRosWrapperException(e)
55 
56  # Call service
57  try:
58  service = rospy.ServiceProxy(service_name, service_msg_type)
59  response = service(*args)
60  return response
61  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
62  raise RobotStatusRosWrapperException(e)
63 
64  def __classic_return_w_check(self, result):
65  self.__check_result_status(result)
66  return result.status, result.message
67 
68  @staticmethod
69  def __check_result_status(result):
70  if result.status < 0:
71  raise RobotStatusRosWrapperException("Error Code : {}\nMessage : {}".format(result.status, result.message))
